beer.beer_description:
NB: The bottles currently in stores saying "Palm Retro" are also this entry. The beer is the same, it's just the labels that are in retro style.

PALM Ale has long been one of Europe’s top-selling specialty beers. Made with English hops, French Barley, and Belgian yeast, PALM represents the best of European beer-making traditions. It’s the roasted Champagne Malt which gives PALM its amber color, but without being heavy. Also available bottle-conditioned as Palm Hergist.
Sold as Palm outside of Europe.

NB: The bottles currently in stores saying "Palm Retro" are also this entry. The beer is the same, it's just the labels that are in retro style.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 315 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 64!

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!

While spontaneity can be fun, sometimes you want to make sure your adventure will rock. Checkout the menu at an Untappd Verified Venue before visiting and know exactly what’s on tap! That's 110 check-ins at venue that is verified. Try 5 more for Level 23!

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 65 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 14!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 10 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 3.

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That's 290 check-ins with a photo.  Try 5 more for Level 59!

You obviously are a big fan of Belgian Beer, and rightfully so! Three cheers to the great Belgian beers and their uniquely crafted flavors!

That's 30 different beers from Belgium. Try 5 more for Level 7.

items.badge_description: You raise your glass so much you barely have time to drink it! Cheers! Toast to 15 check-ins in a month.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 20 check-ins with a photo.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 415 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 84!

Round and round the wheel goes! Which style you’ll be drinking, nobody knows! Your desire to explore different styles is inspiring. Keep it up! That's a check-in to at least 155 different styles. Try 5 more for Level 32!

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 20 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 5!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 145 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 30!

items.badge_description: Fresh from the tap is one of the best ways to enjoy a beer. Just try to use a glass and not drink directly from the tap, as tempting as it may be. That's 340 checkins with the serving style of Draft. Try 5 more for Level 69!
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 30 different Pale Ales or American Pale Wheats. Try 5 more for Level 7.

As the hub of the town's social scene, your local pub has what you're craving. Be sure to stop by for a pint or two! That's a beer at 45 different venues with the categories of Pub, Irish Pub or Gastropub. Visit 5 more for Level 10!
